Title: Malicious code in @operato/board (npm)
Description:
This package was compromised by the Shai-Hulud NPM worm.
The malicious payload steals tokens and credentials and publishes
them to GitHub before propogating itself to NPM packages the user owns.
AffectedVersions: Version 9.0.35, all versions starting from 9.0.36 up to 9.0.46, version 9.0.36, version 9.0.37, version 9.0.38, version 9.0.39, version 9.0.40, version 9.0.41, version 9.0.42, version 9.0.43, version 9.0.44, version 9.0.45, version 9.0.46, version 9.0.47, version 9.0.48, version 9.0.49, version 9.0.50, version 9.0.51
Solution: Unfortunately, there is no solution available yet.
